content: सावन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [सवनं यागांगं स्नानं सोमनि ष्पीडनं वा तस्येदमण्] Relating to, or comprising, the three {%savanas%}. --नः {@--1@} An institutor of a sacrifice, or one who employs priests at a sacrifice. {@--2@} The conclusion of a sacrifice, or the ceremony by which it is concluded. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Varuṇa. {@--4@} A month of thirty solar days. {@--5@} A natural day from sunrise to sunset. {@--6@} A particular kind of year.
